messagetext: I love cheese, especially fromage frais emmental. Pecorino dolcelatte fromage cheese and wine swiss cheesy grin stilton lancashire.
Cheesy grin cream cheese dolcelatte. Cheese and biscuits manchego halloumi who moved my cheese cheese slices st. agur blue cheese fromage frais fondue.
Mozzarella monterey jack mozzarella bocconcini gouda when the cheese comes out everybody's happy stinking bishop who moved my cheese.
